page.title: 07Entertainments,Hobbies,Pets.
page.content: Most households say that Gardening or Hunting,on horseback or following by car,are thier chief outdoor relaxations.Shooting & Fishing follow & some play Cricket or Tennis in Dulverton. Some sail at nearby Wimbleball & one enjoys Motocross. Another's main intrest is racing, including the training & selling of racehorses; another of his interests is drinking & trading in wine; each hobby has to be self_supporting. Every house has television & radio. There is a professional artist & several enjoy painting. Photography, Dressmaking and Knitting are mentioned & the more unusual crafts of Lacemaking,Spinning and Weaving are kept alive.Some like to eat out or visit Theatres & concerts. Nearly every home has one or more dogs or cats and some rear poultry.
